title: Diamond-studded Kadas: The Modern Lakshmi Bangles
features: These contemporary kadas feature a sleek, minimalist design with evenly spaced, star-set diamonds. The high polish finish gives a brilliant sheen. It's a delicate piece that beautifully blends into western style jewelry, while maintaining South Indian aesthetics. Inspired by the strength and protection of traditional bangles, these lightweight Kadas are crafted for comfortable, daily wear.
colors: Warm yellow gold with sparkling white diamonds
occasions: or as a subtle accent to festive attire during Diwali
or Ugadi. Also makes a perfect gift for milestone celebrations and Annaprasana.
description: Crafted with the finest 22K gold and ethically sourced diamonds. The minimalist design adds a touch of sophistication, suitable for any occasion. The brilliant sparkle of the diamonds brings added charm. Each bangle comes with our lifetime warranty and free polishing services. A perfect fusion of tradition and modernity.
